message.msg: Cursor "Forward Only" prohibits the movement back through the records
Do not use the method %0 for establishing the properties MaxRecords not equal to zero.
Invalid parameter value in the filter.
Change the parameter %0 with an open RecordSet is not permissible.
The index is invalid for filtering.
An invalid data type of the parameter - %0
The expansion of the %0 is not installed in PHP.
